Row.Text: Resource Re-sorts • group settlements by factory and by conditional bonus
On the resource screen, list settlements with factories first, then cities with a conditional bonus (Rail Station, Distant Lands).
Resource Re-sorts • group settlements by number of resource slots
On the resource screen, list settlements with more resource slots before those with fewer.
Resource Re-sorts • separate cities and towns on the resource screen
On the resource screen, list the capital first, then cities, then towns.
